DOC.brief_summary: Background : -This protocol provide mean screen potential candidate NCI Radiation Oncology Branch ( ROB ) protocol . Objectives : -To permit evaluation patient refer NCI Radiation Oncology Branch order identify individual suitable candidate Radiation Oncology Branch clinical research protocol . Eligibility : -Patients suspect , biopsy proven malignant disease patient benign condition radiotherapy potential treatment . Design : -This screen protocol . No investigational treatment administer protocol .

DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Patients suspect , biopsy proven malignant disease patient benign condition radiotherapy potential treatment . Patient guardian able provide inform consent . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Candidates meet inclusion criterion .
